turn.1: There was no before.    Space and Time started a split second after the big bang.  Everything in the universe comes from it.  An analogy:. That concept alone is very hard for the human mind to conceptualise.

There is no cause, it just is.  When we measure it, we can see its effects, but not it's cause.  We are catching it in progress, in exsistence, because it simply happens.  The same applies to the big bang.  Don't worry, the universe is total chaos.
